data.eml:eml: Description and ecology of two new species of Gyronotus van Lansberge, 1874 (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae) from southern Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moretto, Philippe, Perissinotto, Renzo (2013): Description and ecology of two new species of Gyronotus van Lansberge, 1874 (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae) from southern Africa. ZooKeys 344: 73-82, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.344.6101, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.344.6101
